definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">block_break</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The percent that the sapling can drop when leaves are broken.</comment></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This can also be replaced with a tag as well.</comment><value name="a"><block type="blockstate_from_deps"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="registryname_to_mcitemblock"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The leaf block you want to add the drop to.</comment><value name="registryname"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">silly_willy_core:wonder_oak_leaves</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:WonderOakSapling</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Your custom slappling drop.</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
